Rayon Sports vs AS Kigali

Rayon Sports 1-2 AS Kigali

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:15

AS Kigali igeze ku mukino wa nyuma

AS Kigali igeze ku mukino wa nyuma w'igikombe cy'Amahoro ku nshuro ya kabiri, aho isezereye Rayon Sports iyitsinze kuri penaliti 4-2 nyuma y'uko amakipe yombi yari anganyije ibitego 3-3 mu mikino yombi ya 1/2.

AS Kigali izamenya ikipe bazahura kuri iki Cyumweru ubwo Police FC izaba yisobanura na Kiyovu Sports mu wundi mukino wa 1/2. Kiyovu yari yatsinze 2-0 mu mukino ubanza.

Umukino wa nyuma uzaba tariki ya 4 Nyakanga mu gihe ikipe izegukana iri rushanwa ari yo izahagararira u Rwanda muri CAF Confederation Cup 2019/20.

17:12

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti ya gatanu

Nsabimana Eric Zidane atsinze penaliti ya nyuma ya AS Kigali inayihaye gukomeza ku mukino wa nyuma itsinze 4-2.

17:11

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya kane

Donkor Prosper yinjije penaliti ya kane ya Rayon Sports.

17:10

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti ya kane

Bishira Latif yinjije penaliti ya kane ya AS Kigali.

17:09

Rayon Sports ihushije penaliti ya gatatu

Manishimwe Djabel ateye penaliti ya gatatu ahawe, hejuru kure.

17:08

AS Kigali ihushije penaliti ya gatatu

Ntate Djumaini ateye penaliti ya gatatu hejuru.

17:08

Rayon Sports ihushije penalit ya kabiri

Bukuru Christophe ahushije penaliti ya kabiri itewe na Bukuru.

17:07

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti ya kabiri

Benedata Janvier atye penaliti ya kabiri ya AS Kigali ayinjiza neza.

17:05

Rayon Sports yinjije penaliti ya mbere

Nyandwi Saddam ateye penaliti ya mbere ya Rayon Sports, ayinjiza neza.

17:04

AS Kigali yinjije penaliti ya mbere

Ntamuhanga Tumaini Tity, kapiteni wa AS kigali, ateye penaliti ya mbere umunyezamu Mazimpaka ayikoze ariko ikomeza mu izamu.

16:59

Umukino urarangiye: Hagiye gukurikiraho penaliti

Buri kipe itsinze indi ibitego 2-1 mu mukino yakiriwemo, bityo aranganya ibitego 3-3 mu mikino yombi ndetse hagiye guterwa penaliti.

Ubwo aya makipe yombi yahuriraga mu ijonjora ribanza, Rayon Sports yasezereye AS Kigali kuri penaliti 4-2, n'uyu munsi bagiye kuzitera.

16:57

90+7' Gusimbuza

Umunyezamu Mazimpaka Andre yari agiye gusimburwa na Bikorimana ariko Djabel asabye ko hajyamo Mugisha Francois Master ufashe umwanya wa Nyandwi Saddam wavunitse.

16:54

90+4' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports yishyuye igitego kimwe muri bibiri yatsinzwe ku mupira utewe na Mazimpaka Andre, ukurwaho na Bate, abakinnyi be bananirwa gukiza izamu, Ange awushyira mu nshundura.

Mukanya ni penaliti niba nta gihindutse.

16:51

90+2' Umukin uhagaze gato

Umukinnyi wa AS Kigali, Bishira Latif aryamye hasi avurwa nyuma yo kuongana n'umunyezamu we Bate Shamiru.

16:49

90+1' Koruneri ya Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel ateye koruneri ya Rayon Sports umupira ugarurwa n'abakinnyi ba AS Kigali urarenga. Abakinnyi b'inyuma ba AS Kigali n'umunyezamu wabo bakomeje guhagara bwuma.

16:48

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ine y'inyongera muri uyu mukino uri kubera i Nyamirambo.

16:46

88' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Umusifuzi wa kane asabiye umutoza wungirije wa AS Kigali, Nshutinamagara Ismail 'Kodo' ikarita y'umuhondo. Barayimuhaye asubira kwicara.

16:45

86' Bate yabaye ibamba

Rayon Sports ikomeje gutera imipira ya kure ishaka igitego ariko umunyezamu wa AS Kigali, Bate Shamiru yabaye ibamba. Nyandwi Saddam ateye umupira ukomeye ufatwa n'uyu munyezamu.

16:40

81' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Nyandwi Saddam ahinduye umupira akinana na Habimana Hussein uteye mu izamu, Bate afata neza umupira. Nyandwi yongeye guhindura umupira muremure, Ulimwengu ashyizeho umutwe ujya hanze.

16:38

80' Gusimbuza

Nshimiyimana Ibrahim yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Kalanda Frank watsinze igitego cya kabiri cya AS Kigali.

16:36

78' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Ntate Djumaini akiniye nabi umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports, ikosa rihanwe na Bukuru Christophe uteye umupira muremure urenga nta wundi uwukozeho,

16:34

76' Gusimbuza

Ndarusanze Jean Claude wagize uruhare mu gitego cya kabiri cya AS Kigali, asimbuwe na Nova Bayama.

16:33

75' Rayon Sports ikomeje gushaka igitego

Mutsinzi Ange agerageje ishoti rikomeye rigiye hanze. Nyuma y'iminota mike na Manishimwe Djabel ateye ishoti rikomeye umunyezamu Bate Shamiru afata neza umupira. Kwinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina byanze, Rayon Sports iri kugeragereza amahirwe inyuma.

16:30

72' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

AS Kigali ikoze contre-attaque maze Kalanda Frank asiga abakinnyi bose, arobye umunyezamu Mazimpaka Andre umupira uramutenguha ugarurwa na poto ya kabiri y'izamu.

16:28

70' Ikarita itukura

Michael Sarpong ahawe ikarita itukura nyuma yo gukinira nabi Nsabimana Eric Zidane. Abanje guhabwa umuhondo, arangije abwira nabi umusifuzi Mulindangabo ahita amwongera iyindi. Rayon Sports isigaye ari abakinnyi 10 mu kibuga.

16:24

67' Gusimbuza

Mugisha Gilbert wagowe n'umukino w'uyu munsi, asimbuwe na Mudeyi Suleiman ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports.

16:22

63' Koruneri ya AS Kigali

Ntate Djumaini azamukanye umupira urenzwa na Nyadwi Saddam. Benedata Janvier ateye iyi koruneri umupira ukurwaho na Donkor Prosper n'umutwe. AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe ku mupira utewe na Kalanda uca imbere y'izamu.

16:18

60' Gusimbuza

Ndayisenga Fuadi watsindiye AS Kigali igitego cya mbere, asimbuwe na Ntate Djumaini ku ruhande rw'ikipe y'Umujyi.

16:15

56' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Bate Shamiru arengeje umupira ahawe na myugariro we, Rayon Sports irenguye umupira ufatwa na AS Kigali ikoze contre-attaque, umusifuzi avuga ko Kalanda yarayemo.

16:08

50' Umukino uhagazeho gato

Umukino uhagaze gato havurwa umukinnyi wa AS Kigali uryamye hasi mu kibuga. Rurangwa Mossi asohowe mu kibuga ari ku ngobyi.

16:06

48' Igitego cya kabiri cya AS Kigali

Benedata Janvier acenze Donkor Prosper, akurikira uyu mupira ariko Nsabimana Eric arawumwaka, awuhindura mu izamu ugera kuri Kalanda Frank utsinze igitego cya kabiri cya AS Kigali.

16:03

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Rayon Sports itangije igice cya kabiri ndetse isatira ariko umusifuz avuga ko habayeho kurarira.

15:48

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Igice cya mbere kirangiye AS Kigali itsinze igitego 1-0.

Kugeza ubu amakipe yombi aranganya ibitego 2-2 ariko birangiye gutya Rayon Sports yakomeza kuko yatsindiye ibitego byinshi hanze.

15:47

45' Igitego cya AS Kigali

Benedata Janvier ateye koruneri ya AS Kigali mu ruhande rw'ibumoso, abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports bananirwa gukiza izamu, Nsabimana Eric ateye umupira ugaruwa n'umutambiko w'izamu usanga Kalanda wunamye, Fuadi Ndayisenga ashyira umupira mu izamu.

15:44

43' Ubundi buryo kuri Rayon Sports

Nyuma yo kugerageza ishoti rikomeye ryafashwe na Bate, Iradukunda Eric yongeye guhindura undi mupira mu izamu ashaka Sarpong, Ulimwengu na Gilbert, ariko bose nta n'umwe ubashije kugera kuri uyu mupira ugiye hanze.

15:41

39' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Bukuru Christophe ashibuye agapira keza ashaka Mugisha Gilbert uteye ishoti rikomeye rica imbere y'izamu rya AS Kigali.

15:37

36' Koruneri ya AS Kigali

Benedata Janvier ateye koruneri ya AS Kigali, Rayon Sports irenza umupira urenguwe, na none Donkor Prosper awushyira muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

15:36

34' Rayon Sports ihushije ubundi buryo

Iradukunda Eric ahinduye umupira mu izamu ashaka Mugisha Gilbert, Niyomugabo Claude awushyira muri koruneri n'umutwe. Mugisha Gilbert yongeye kuwusubiza mu kibuga, AS Kigali yirwanaho itera umupira imbere.

15:32

31' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Bukuru Christophe atanze umupira kuri Michael Sarpong uwuhinduye mu rubuga rw'amahina ashaka Jules Ulimwengu ugonganye na Bate Shamiru wari usohotse kuwufata. Abakinnyi bombi baryamye hasi bavurwa.

15:29

27' Bate arokoye AS Kigali

Manishimwe Djabel ashatse gutungura umunyezamu wa AS Kigali ari muri metero nka 35, atera ishoti rirerire, Bate Shamiru, umwe mu banyezamu bagufi mu gihugu, arazamuka akuramo umupira ujya muri koruneri itewe na Nyandwi Saddam awishyirira hanze.

15:27

26' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Ndayisenga Fuadi ateye umupira w'umuterekano ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali, Bishira Latif aragwa, abakinnyi bavuga ko yakiniwe nabi ariko umusifuzi arabyihorera. AS Kigali ikomeje kugerageza amashoti abakinnyi ba Rayon birwanaho

15:25

24' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong agerageje ishoti rikomeye mu izamu rya AS Kigali, Bate Shamiru afata neza umupira. Rayon Sports isa n'iyakangutse noneho yatangiye gusatira.

15:23

21' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel ateye umupira ahana ikosa mu rubuga rwa AS Kigali, umupira ushyirwa muri koruneri na Niyomugabo Claude n'umutwe. Mugisha Gilbert ayiteye neza, ukorwaho na Bate ugwa ku mutwe w'umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports urarenga.

15:22

20' Rayon Sports yongeye kubaka

Bukuru Christophe agerageje umupira ari inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina umupira ufatwa na Bate Shamiru. Kubonana hagati ya Sarpong, Mugisha na Ulimwengu biracyari ikibazo.

15:17

15' Coup-franc ya AS Kigali

Ndayisenga Fuadi ateye umupira w'umuterekano ku ruhande rwa AS Kigali ukurwaho neza na Mutsinzi Ange.

Rayon Spors imaze gutera umupira umwe mu izamu, wa Mugisha Gilbert, wafashwe neza na Bate Shamiru.

15:16

Kalanda yihanangirijwe bwa nyuma

Rutahizamu wa AS Kigali, Frank Kalanda ahawe gasopo ya nyuma n'umusifuzi nyuma yo gukora mu maso myugariro wa Rayon Sports, Habimana Hussein. Aba bombi n'ubundi kare bigeze kugongana bari imbere y'izamu rya Rayon Sports.

15:11

10' Rayon Sports 0-0 AS Kigali (agg 2-1)

AS Kigali ni yo ikomeje kwiharira umupira muri iyi minota ibanza n'ubwo na yo yagowe no kubonaaho imenera ngo igeze umupira mu rushundura. Rayon Sports nta buryo bugana mu izamu irarema kugeza kuri uyu munota wa 10.

15:06

5' AS Kigali ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ndarusanze Jean Claude ahinduye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, Nyandwi Saddam ashaka kuwuha Mazimpaka Andre n'igituza, ukorwaho gato na Ndayisenga Fuad wari hagati y'aba bombi, ku bw'amahirwe make uramutenguha ujya hejuru y'izamu.

15:03

1' Koruneri ya AS Kigali

AS Kigali iteye koruneri ya mbere ibonetse mu mukino, umupira uhinduwe na Fuadi Ndayisenga, Ndarusanze Jean Claude ashyizeho umutwe ujya hejuru y'izamu.

15:01

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Mulindangabo Moise atangije umukino. AS Kigali ni yo iteye umupira wa mbere ndetse itangira ihanahana.

14:21

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku mpande zombi

Rayon Sports: Mazimpaka AndrÃ©, Iradukunda Eric, Nyandwi Saddam, Bukuru Christophe, Mutsinzi Ange, Habimana Hussein, Donkor Prosper, Ulimwengu Jules, Michael Sarpong, Mugisha Gilbert na Manishimwe Djabel.

Umutoza: Wagner do Nascimento Silva

AS Kigali: Bate Shamiru, Nshimiyimana Marc Govin, Niyomugabo Claude, Bishira Latif, Rurangwa Mossi, Ntamuhanga Tumaini, Ndayisenga Fuadi, Nsabimana Eric, Benedata Janvier, Kalanda Frank, Ndarusanze Jean Claude

Umutoza: Mateso Jean De Dieu

14:13

AS Kigali irashaka kongera guserukira igihugu

AS Kigali ikeneye kongera gutwara Igikombe cyâ€™Amahoro yegukanye mu 2013, igaserukira igihugu mu mikino nyafurika ya CAF Confederation Cup mu mwaka wakurikiyeho.

Les Citadins yatwaye iki gikombe mu 2001, nyuma ihinduka Kigali FC yihuje na Renaissance FC zikora AS Kigali guhera mu 2007.

14:12

Rayon Sports irashaka kwegukana igikombe cy'igihugu ku nshuro ya 10

Rayon Sports ifite iri rushanwa inshuro icyenda, irashaka gutwara ibikombe byombi uyu mwaka nyuma yo kwegukana shampiyona ya 2018/2019.

Muri izi nshuro icyenda iyi kipe yambara ubururu n'umweru yatwayemo igikombe cy'igihugu harimo eshatu kuva iri rushanwa ryitiriwe amahoro mu 1995, aho yaritwaye mu 1998, 2005 & 2016.

APR FC na yo imaze kwegukana iki gikombe inshuro icyenda.

14:09

Gahunda irambuye ya 1/2 cy'Igikombe cy'Amahoro

Ku wa Gatatu

AS Kigali 1-2 Rayon Sports FC

Ku wa Kane

SC Kiyovu 2-0 Police FC

Imikino yo kwishyura

Ku wa Gatandatu

Rayon Sports FC vs AS Kigali (Stade de Kigali, 15h00)

Ku Cyumweru

Police FC vs SC Kiyovu (Stade de Kigali, 15h00)

Abakinnyi batemerewe gukina imikino yo kwishyura

1. Irambona Eric (Rayon Sports FC)
2. Kakule Mugheni Fabrice (Rayon Sports FC)
3. Ahoyikuye Jean Paul (SC Kiyovu)

14:05

Rayon Sports irabura bamwe mu bakinnyi

Rayon Sports ishaka kugera ku mukino wa nyuma ku nshuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya, igiye gukina uyu mukino idafite Kakule Mugheni Fabrice ufite amakarita abiri y'umuhondo na Irambona Eric wabonye ikarita itukura mu mukino ubanza.

14:02

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino wo kwishyura muri 1/2 cy'Igikombe cy'Amahoro hagati ya Rayon Sports na AS Kigali.

Umukino ubanza wakiriwe na AS Kigali ku wa Gatatu, warangiye Rayon Sports itsinze ibitego 2-1.

Umukino nyir'zina uratangira mukanya saa 15:00.
